nodes.text: Darth Guile was a male Sith Lord who was sensitive to the Force, and eventually ascended to the rank of Dark Lord of the Sith. At some point during his reign, Guile compared the Sith to minuscule malignant cells that were unable to be detected, yet were able to spread throughout an individual's body and ultimately kill its victim. His beliefs were recounted by the Dark Lord Darth Plagueis and his apprentice, Darth Sidious.
Darth Guile was created by James Luceno. The character was briefly mentioned in discussion between Darth Plagueis and Darth Sidious in the novel Darth Plagueis, released on January 10, 2012.
